title: Was A Hindu Brahmin Thrashed By A Muslim Mob In West Bengal As Claimed?
subtitle: A video of a mob thrashing a man accused of molesting a girl is going viral as something else on social media.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim: This is a wrong and mischievous post. This priest was manhandled by the family members of the victim girl where he allegedly molested her. 1
